topic.title: Resonance: Beings of Frequency (Ful Documentary)
topic.body:
Recommended lockdown videos: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9mK93gHFWXs
"The first documentary film to investigate the actual mechanisms by which mobile phone technology can cause cancer. Resonance takes a deeper look at how humanity is reacting to the most profound environmental change the planet has ever seen. Two billion years ago life first appeared on earth, a planet bathed in a natural electromagnetic frequency. As life slowly evolved from simple to complex organisms, it did so surrounded by this frequency, forming a harmonic relationship with it, a relationship that science is just beginning to comprehend. New research is showing that exposure to this frequency is vital to human beings. It controls our mental and physical health, it synchronizes our circadian rhythms, it aids our immune system, and it improves our overall sense of well-being. Not only are we surrounded by natural frequencies, our bodies are suffused with them. Our cells communicate using electromagnetic frequencies. Our brain emits a constant stream of frequencies and our DNA delivers instructions using frequency waves. Without them, we could not exist."

topic.title: Image hosting site recommendations & black theme on Big Kopy Kate 2
topic.body:
I'm looking for a image hosting site to use in connection to Zerotalk or should I clone a site and alter and use that ?  
My Firefox dark website extention. don't work on Zeronet and it's especial bad on KK2 watching a dark video, any suggestions ?

1586994391_1N16MiCzsNzfRczxCdK7sWWhbiCvd.body:
> [draugrdeathlord](#comment_528_12BRJSQrTETJVZzt2jHdqPywv3SdugSywC): 
What's SSBN 734

SSBN  = Sub Surface Ballistic Nuclear (Submarine) an Ohio class. (Used in the movie 'The Abyss')
SSN = Sub Surface Nuclear = Los Angle class sub, is used in the movie The Hunt for Red October , USS Dallas.
Not many of the new Seawolf class is build.
What is the news about SSBN 734 ?

1587107506_1PGTHAmvu7K2PM7qqfoKyWv69aJsA.body: Every one has there own bias, so what is yours?

> [z0z0z0z0z0z0z0z1](#comment_11_1GGSNB12PSSTBU2AoYyQaEU4jXqjXctVxZ): You should fuck off to reddit with this fagshit. Seriously.

One of the good things about reddit is that you can see peoples posting history, at least 3 times I've become angry about some post someone did, I then put him/he in a box, thinking the person must be this type, but then it turns out that we have a lot of things in common, and we are not really a box, but more like intersecting mesh, with snap to grid enabled. (I've just smoked cannabis after a two week without. Ding dong :--)

> [edgelordofdecent](#comment_481_1PGTHAmvu7K2PM7qqfoKyWv69aJsAaJQp5): I would recommend he doesn't smoke weed all the time or he will stop getting any pleasure from it. His decision to make.

I agree no one should intoxicate themself to often, for me it's a work before play thing, and not while I'm on the job or drive my car, even that I must admit that driving around my neighbourhood at night-time, a little bit stoned on my electric skateboard felt amazing, looking forward to get back on it, for now I drive a e-scooter and e-bike. Highly recommended. Did 30 km on the e-scooter in nice weather in Copenhagen's green path's yesterday.

Do you know what a fake artificial feeling feels like vs a original natural one ?

> [z0z0z0z0z0z0z0z1](#comment_12_1GGSNB12PSSTBU2AoYyQaEU4jXqjXctVxZ): You are new here. If you put the user name on ZeroHello in search box you can see whole posting history under that account.
But that takes effort, and I did a search on your name and the results was not that interesting.
For me personally I'm trying real hard to be the shepherd and chose a positive path, since I know the other condition too well: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Video=1587276579_15sV7CLD3U692bxLtoJK5HPPeDZxPJeLD3

I've just realised who I'm talking too after seen @thetruth post's, I've upvoted you or what's ever it's called,  now there is a green 5 next to your name. :-)
The reason I'm happy to be me in the coming time, is be cause I've been pretty good in selecting my conspiracy wisely to stay grounded and centred,  while at the same time gained a understanding of the workings of The Adjustment Bureau. 

"microwaves control our brains" Now that sounds a bit crazy to me, I could accept a non-personal tiny influence not outright control, while thinking about something like this 'lecture' from Michael Persinger 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9l6VPpDublg
I find this movie entertaining and spooky, and with Snowden in mind a vigilance for such a think seams needed or something.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Video=1586970336_15sV7CLD3U692bxLtoJK5HPPeDZxPJeLD3
What do you think somewhere between total nuts and total unaware. 
Aristotle said, "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it"

1587283149_15sV7CLD3U692bxLtoJK5HPPeDZxP.body:
> [cexy](#comment_10_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eHkc7BL): I also hate white bg websites. They are assault on eyes if they force just that look. A very quick and not insightful suggestion is ZeroMe and 8chan for images but their format might still not be exactly your thing. Unlimit talk is zerotalk almost completely except it allows graphics in posts. Everyone of them might not meet some of your key criteria. All the best!

Found 8chan. Looks like they have a solution to a user choice with Dark.css/Light.css selector switch. Should be default in 2020.
